channel.title: Problem when server is running (nulls)
channel.description:
Ok guys, while i'm running server nothing happens, but then....this appears:
[IMG]http://img684.imageshack.us/img684/3489/client.jpg[/img]
can you tell me why this bug happens and how can i fix it?
explain in a detailed way since i dont understand a lot.
and also , some times it appears on server while im running it, this appears:
null null null..
and it continues...what's that and how to fix it?
i wait for answers.thanks. ´ im running server on a delta based.

item.title: Problem when server is running (nulls)
item.dc:creator: @facundo facundo
item.description:
@facundo wrote:

i cleared ipbanned ppl file, is that right?
[br][br][size=1]Posted on: January 02, 2010, 11:38:30 pm[/size][hr]up

Read full topic

item.title: Problem when server is running (nulls)
item.dc:creator: @deathschaos9 DeathsChaos9
item.description:
@deathschaos9 wrote:

Something is trying to connect to your server, but it isnt letting it on, thus causing the NullPointerException. Check in your server files to see if that ip is blocked in some way.

Read full topic
